name: TheMarshallProject
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
From the newsroom of The Marshall Project, a non-partisan, non-profit news organization dedicated to covering the U.S. criminal justice system.

Included in this Flash Briefing are our daily email newsletter, Opening Statement, which rounds up the must-read criminal justice news of the day from around the web, and our week in review newsletter, Closing Argument." 

For more information on these stories and more, visit https://www.themarshallproject.org/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
